title: Handle a Tenant's Subletting Request
description: A tenant requests permission to sublet their apartment for the summer.

tasks.description: Review the original lease agreement to see if subletting is permitted.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the lease allows subletting with landlord approval.

tasks.description: Require the tenant to have the proposed sub-tenant complete a rental application.
tasks.expected_outcome: The sub-tenant submits an application for screening.

tasks.description: Screen the sub-tenant's application. If they are approved, draft a sublease agreement for all parties to sign.
tasks.expected_outcome: The sub-tenant is approved and a formal sublease agreement is executed.
